sections.title: General
items: Prices are in JPY and include the session fee and a post-session learning summary.
In-person and group sessions are available within limited locations—contact me for details.

sections.title: Discounts
items: FIRST20: 20% off your first private 1:1 lesson (online or in-person).
FIRST20 is not valid for group sessions or package purchases.

sections.title: Packages (credits)
items: Each credit equals one 50-minute private session.
Schedule each session anytime within the validity window.
4-Pack: valid 120 days from purchase; 8-Pack: valid 240 days from purchase.
Credit usage: 1 credit per session held, or if you cancel within 24 hours of the start time.
Rescheduling allowed up to 24 hours before start.
Credits are for the purchaser only and are not transferable.

sections.title: Refunds — Single Lessons
items: Cancel >48h before: refund minus a ¥500 cancellation/admin fee (free reschedule also available).
Cancel within 24h or after the session occurs: no refund (except in case of service issues on my side).

sections.title: Refunds — Packages
items: Refundable within 48 hours of purchase if unused; refund minus a cancellation/admin fee of ¥1,000 (4-Pack) or ¥1,500 (8-Pack).
After 48 hours or once any credit is used: non-refundable.
No refunds after the validity period ends.

sections.title: Payment
items: Online lessons: payment is requested within 24 hours of booking to keep your spot (payment link provided by email).
In-person lessons: pay online in advance or in cash on the day.

location.title: Location Info
location.body: In-person sessions currently available in Jiyugaoka, Omori, Oimachi, Shinagawa, and Gotanda upon request. Locations outside these areas are subject to additional charges.

corporate.title: Corporate Training
corporate.body: Tailored programs for teams and companies.
